author: FRIENDLYMAN
title: guidance required..
text: # 1 i am planning to visit uttarakhand in 08/12/15. this is my first visit in this region. so i need some guidance from the experienced indiamike's friends. i need a circular journey. and i have 12 days in hand from 08/12-20/12. from delhi, i will take the morning train to reach kathgodam, as i didn't get ticket in the night train of 07/12/15. i have two plan - 1st one :- 1) reach kathgodam transfer to mukteswar. n/s at mukteswar 2) mukteswar to binsar via almorah. n/s at binsar 3) binsar to chaukori via patal bhubaneswar. 2 night stay at chukori. 4) chaukori to munshiyari. 2 night stay at munshiyari 5) munshiyari to kousani via bageswar. n/s at kousani 6)kousani to nainital. 3 n/s at nainital 7) nainital to kathgodam. my 2nd plan is just opposite of the above plan- 1) kathgodam to nainital. 3 n/s at nainital. 2) nainital to kausani via ranikhet. 2 n/s kausani. 3) kausani to chakori vai bijnath-bageshwar. 2 n/s at chakori. 4) chakori to munshiyari. 2 n/s at munshiyari. 5) munshiyari to almora. n/s at almora. 6) almora to kathgodam. now my problem is - which plan is perfect as per my requirement. i.e.- circular way journey. and as it will be off peak season then if i don't book any hotel then will it be right plan or i have to book all the hotels in advance ? whether the KMVN banglow/hotels are ok ? what will be the small car (alto etc) rate at this time?n (lots of queries ) if any one can give me better plan then it would be very helpful. thanks in advance
